extendedInfo.description: Code Master Super Mind is a fun and clever game where the goal is to break the hidden code, consisting of colors(balls) or figures. Guess by guess you get more information until you can find the secret code. Try to break the code using as few tries as possible!There are many levels with different difficulties, and it is also possible to play with figures. The figure game mode is a bit easier and more fun for kids, playing with flowers, cars, birds etc. They are probably smarter than you think.There is also a new game mode with colors in two dimensions. An extra challenge for your logical thinking.Code Master Super Mind is a fun game if you want to exercise your mind and brain or just looking for a good and entertaining  way to pass your time. Suitable both for children and adults because of the different levels and difficulties.Enjoy!
